phrases: I apologize for summoning you on such short notice.
To be frank, I would like to ask you for a favor.
Yes madam, how may I be of service?
I would like to practice on you.
I have not used this on humans in quite some time.
I will set you free in just a minute.
Due to the coming of the Calm,
I believe that the situation will change.
And I swear on my family's name, I will carry it out.
It is a stagnant time, when everything comes to a halt.
kodoku ga hoho wo nurasu nurasu kedo
kodoku ga hoho wo nurasu nurasu kedo
But when the dawn emerges in silence
But when the dawn emerges in silence
yoake no kehai ga shizuka ni michite
yoake no kehai ga shizuka ni michite
And carries me up into the skies
And carries me up into the skies
watashi wo sora e maneku yo
watashi wo sora e maneku yo
Hope awaits on the other side
Hope awaits on the other side
I have been wandering, trying to find you
I have been wandering, trying to find you
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo sagasu tabi
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo sagasu tabi
We missed each other, but our hands touched
We missed each other, but our hands touched
surechigau ishiki te ga fureta yo ne
surechigau ishiki te ga fureta yo ne
I will hold your hand tightly
I will hold your hand tightly
The first step toward our dream
The first step toward our dream
We are drawn closer as we begin to accept each other
We are drawn closer as we begin to accept each other
tagai wo uketomeru tabi ni hikareteku
tagai wo uketomeru tabi ni hikareteku
We will not need to spend our days in sadness anymore
We will not need to spend our days in sadness anymore
Because we will have a great time together
Because we will have a great time together
tagai wo uketomete ikiru yorokobi ni
tagai wo uketomete ikiru yorokobi ni
That I am sure the two of us will
That I am sure the two of us will
What matters is that I have finally found you
What matters is that I have finally found you
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo mitsuketa yo
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo mitsuketa yo
You are going to be late.
I only transferred to this school so I would have more opportunities to attack you, Mirai.
With that reason no longer valid, I see no need to
We do not have time to talk.
Your hair is such a mess!
Mirai, you have no room to talk.
And that is why you are late?
It was by no means my fault!
If Sakura had gotten out of bed faster
Please stop trying to force the knot out!
What the heck do you think you are doing?!
Do you think that those are magic words that can get you out of anything?!
Oh, I fell right back asleep.
To be honest, I spent seven hours debating whether you would look better in green-framed or rimless glasses.
What a way to spent seven hours...
You took me completely by surprise!
Finals are just around the corner.
So it is obvious why we are reviewing this page in class, is not it?
Here I am, going out of my way to help you,
but every now and then some people do not show any appreciation for...
Oh, I will be taking a week off for personal reasons starting tomorrow.
If you have any questions, you would better ask them today!
Then revive and die a million times!
You do realize that is verbal abuse, do not you?
Then I will claim sexual harassment!
Do not think I will go easy on you just because you are a high schooler!
She is taking it way too seriously.
At long last, the Calm is coming!
But there is, like, something more important right now.
Akkun, I heard that you, like, broke your promise with me and approached the Hollow Shadow.
I was, like, so upset that I could not even eat my sunflower seeds!
It is amazing that she has a new character to play with every postcard she sends.
They are all kind of the same, though.
And Kuriyama-san, why are you dressed up like that?
I-I was in the middle of work!
I never thought I would ever have to wear something like this.
Thank goodness I had Sakura head home without me.
So Akkun, when did you, like, turn into such a little delinquent?
When I borrowed a dirty magazine from a friend, you went behind my back
and tore out the page that had a nude model wearing glasses.
Where has my pure-hearted, darling Akkun gone?
She is not making the right sound!
It is the small things like this that show her age.
Like I said, quit calmly analyzing her!
I-I am going to run out of time if I keep this up!
Now, to get to the heart of this letter.
The Calm is, like, totally coming!
Where do you draw the line between genius and insane?
Be sure to be, like, extra careful!
Promise Yacchan you will, like, be careful, Akkun!
That is all you had to say?!
In short, the Calm refers to a period during which our demon powers are weakened.
I do not know the details, but according to the records,
our innate vitality apparently drops dramatically.
As such, Exterminators are able to defeat demons
that are normally out of their league, so they are thrilled.
But in that case, why do I need to be careful?
If your demon powers weaken, what do you think would happen to you?
Half-demons are too rare for me to know for certain,
but your immortality is one trait that you could temporarily lose.
And if an Exterminator found him in that vulnerable state,
there is a chance Akkey would be attacked.
Is not that why you escorted him here?
To be precise, she said that the Calm does not start until midnight.
Perhaps it is just me, but I think the air feels somewhat heavy.
I would not say it is heavy.
At times like this, I think my little sister and I...
should walk home side by side.
Because she does not want to walk home with you.
Because you are always acting like that!
Senpai, I am going to miss the sale on frozen dinners if I do not hurry, so I have got to run!
I can feel it in my chest.
Well, I figured we could have a talk while going out for a drive.
I want to tell you about what you saw.
many of the more powerful demons lack a physical body.
It is said that it takes years for these demons to come into physical being.
Supposedly, they are born from the resentment and twisted hearts of countless people
fusing together before eventually taking form.
If left alone, they could lead the world to ruin.
It is said that these demons are the origin of disease, natural disasters, and war.
They are collectively referred to as Beyond the Boundary.
However, we are fortunate that only a fragment of this one has shown up.
It has not started to spread its influence yet.
Why are you telling me all of this?
The Exterminator's Society has been keeping their eye on it for ages.
I was made to believe that the tight-lipped Nase family has more information on it.
I thought I would be able to get you to talk,
but it looks like the baby of the family has been kept in the dark.
What is the plan for subduing the demon you refer to as Beyond the Boundary?
Is the Nase family going to annihilate it in secret?
I could not get any info on that, either!
Your sister is way too scary!
I found some intriguing information regarding Kuriyama Mirai.
I found that the Inami family tried to kill Kuriyama Mirai
Apparently, the one who stopped them...
Do you think that is somehow linked to this Beyond the Boundary?
But would not you find it fascinating if it was?
The way you followed your little sister all of the way out here...
It sure looks like you have got a sister complex.
I do not just look like I do!
You should go ask your little sister!
Thank you for that delicious little outburst.
Akihito-kun, you were hit by a car, so why...
Wh-What makes you think I would do that?
Rest for just a little longer.
Thank you for riding with us.
Please make sure to take all of your belongings.
It is only natural to assume that the Calm had something to do with this.
However, I get the feeling that his human half has been greatly weakened along with his demon half.
Is there anything we can do to help him get better?
There are ways to help humans
and ways to help demons to some extent,
To be perfectly honest, half-demons are so rare, I do not really know what would help them recover.
At any rate, he is suffering from a fever, so I brought some cool water.
I can take care of that!
You two should head home for now.
For the duration of the Calm, we cannot go out in the open anyway.
Sitting and watching Kanbara-kun sleep will not help him get better, now will it?
Do not you have school tomorrow as well?
When did Kanbara-senpai and Mirai meet?
I do not know the details,
but I think they met shortly after Mirai-chan moved here.
Ai, make sure to stay on your guard.
I suspect that they should be ripe by now.
This is what I have been chasing after since everything started.
I will not let the Nase family claim it.
I never expected that to make so many pop out!
I had my eye on that one!
Do your best to stay out of her way.
In this area, the Nase family's authority is absolute.
In an attempt to create internal rifts,
enemy powers have tried to stir up trouble more than once.
Then you are saying everything Fujima Miroku told me is a lie?
That is not what I said.
However, I cannot deny that is a distinct possibility.
Izumi once warned me to be wary of the Exterminator's Society.
I suspect that the organization is not on good terms with the Nase family.
And you did not say anything when Kuriyama-san was gossiping about the Society a while back!
I cannot just tell everyone about that!
Besides, I have not been told the full story myself.
I am going to see Izumi-neesan!
She is going to play dumb, and that will be the end of it.
She is your older sister, is not she?
I could say the exact same thing to you.
one for 350 yen, and another for 10 yen.
Your total comes out to 1,870 yen.
I was lost in thought and was not paying attention.
I am sure they will let you stay with him.
But it is not like I could really do anything for him.
Even so, you want to stay by his side.
You do not mean it when you call someone unpleasant like that.
That is what my sister told me a long time ago.
This time you truly meant it.
Not if you want to be with Kanbara-senpai.
I-I do not really want to be with him or anything like that.
It does not have anything to do with that!
Even though I am from a cursed clan...
Even though I possess such abnormal powers...
He treats me like a normal person.
You did not mean it that time, either.
How may I help a member of the Exterminator's Society?
I never thought you would find me.
I guess I should have expected it from a demon that can stand amongst Exterminators.
You do not intend to subdue me, do you?
I simply came to check on the situation here.
But now that it is come to this,
I do not have a choice!
I am taking custody of Kanbara Akihito.
Please hand him over without any trouble.
I would like to hear your reason why first.
You see, I promised to look after Kanbara-kun.
I do not have time to explain myself.
Besides, I doubt you would believe me even if I did.
Did you truly believe I would hand him over after hearing that?
She is much stronger than I had anticipated.
Honestly, I am glad we are in the middle of the Calm.
Where do you think you are going?
Even during the Calm, you are this powerful?
Do you prefer girls who keep you waiting?
seijaku wo kirisaku you otozureta no wa
We met in an inevitable encounter
I see a reflection of regrets
Enveloped in sorrow, you have blossomed beautifully
dare ka no seimei ni tokeru hana
The flower that fuses into someone is life
nee kimi ni mo mieru darou
Hey, do you see it too?
Let us paint over all the mistakes we have made
nando demo ii sa kurikaeshiteiku start line
A new start line will always be there if we want to start over
kako to wa chigau asu wo
Let us make our future different from the past
futari dake no kibou egaku start line
Our small hope will paint a new start line
That is how I always am
I wish I never met him.
I am in front of Senpai.
I think that maybe, just maybe, I really am cursed.
